2018/04/17:
Takahashi09 validation run reference dataset using FluxEngine v1.0 (probably) 2014.

Originally downloaded from:
OCEANFLUX-SHARED/workspace/i.g.c.ashton_exeter.ac.uk/results/takahashiv2009_allinputs_no_gradients

Total global net flux (-1.495046 TgC/yr) is within 94.9803551195 (%) of the value quoted in Takahashi2009 (-1.42 TgC/yr).
